errors_found.issue: The balance check row (Total Assets - Total Liabilities + Equity) does not equal zero for years 2023E onwards, indicating a discrepancy.
errors_found.fix: Verify the calculations for Total Assets, Total Liabilities, and Total Equity. Ensure that all components are correctly summed and that no line items are omitted or incorrectly referenced.

errors_found.issue: The summation of revenue components (Content production and distribution, WildBrain Spark, Consumer Products, Canadian Television Broadcasting) does not align with the revenue line in the main financial statements.
errors_found.fix: Check the references for each revenue component and ensure they are correctly linked to the total revenue line in the BS & CFS sheet.

errors_found.location: Row 34 in FS Calcs (EoP Investment in Film and TV)
errors_found.issue: The End of Period (EoP) investment in film and TV does not correctly reflect the movements (additions, write-downs, expenses) from the supporting calculations.
errors_found.fix: Ensure the formula for EoP investment in film and TV correctly incorporates BoP, development costs, write-downs, expenses, and FX adjustments.

errors_found.location: Row 45 in FS Calcs (EoP Acquired and Library Content)
errors_found.issue: The End of Period (EoP) acquired and library content does not correctly reflect the movements (additions, write-downs, amortization) from the supporting calculations.
errors_found.fix: Verify the formula for EoP acquired and library content to ensure it includes BoP, additions, write-downs, amortization, and FX adjustments.

errors_found.issue: The Long-Term Debt value for 2024E and beyond does not reconcile with the expected financing activities and repayment schedules.
errors_found.fix: Review the financing section of the Cash Flow Statement and ensure that all debt issuances and repayments are accurately reflected in the Long-Term Debt line.

parsed_response.audit_methodology: The audit involved checking the balance sheet discrepancies by comparing Total Assets with Total Liabilities + Equity. Supporting schedules were reviewed to ensure all line items were correctly calculated and linked. The Cash Flow Statement was traced to confirm that all balance sheet movements were captured. Cross-referencing of summation formulas and cell references was performed to identify errors.
